name: Ch.6BaseConvo1
_source: speak;Franz;Miss Lute!|May we have a minute of your time, please?
speak;Lute;Oh?|What would you two have need of me for?
speak;Franz;We saw all the awesome magic you were using out there!|And, uh, we wondered if you could teach us some!|We've never seen such magic this close until now.
speak;Lute;Oh, this magic?|It's beginner material. Trival stuff, really!|If you just study, it should be as easy as breathing.
speak;Neimi;We were really hoping you could teach us!
speak;Lute;...Hmmm...|I'm not sure it would be worthy of my time...
speak;Artur;I think you should help them, Lute.|You could also benefit from teaching them.
speak;Lute;What could I possibly learn that I haven't read?!
speak;Franz;I could show you some of the Renais knights' training regiments.|It's guaranteed to make you stronger!
speak;Lute;...How dull!|Why would I want that?
speak;Artur;...How about I let you have this tome I bought if you help them out?
speak;Artur;I think this will benefit you all.
speak;Lute;It better be worth that book...
alert;Franz's MAG growth has increased by 25!
alert;Neimi's MAG growth has increased by 25!
alert;Lute's STR growth has increased by 30!
